title: General Mark Milley 'Execution' Post
summary: Trump suggested America's top general committed treason and that 'in times gone by, the punishment would have been DEATH!' Milley subsequently received death threats and had to take security precautions.
keyFacts: Truth Social post: Milley's calls to China were 'an act so egregious that, in times gone by, the punishment would have been DEATH!'
Suggested America's top general committed treason for reassuring allies after January 6
Milley subsequently received death threats; had to take security precautions
Former officials called it 'witness intimidation' ahead of potential testimony
Gen. Milley had called Trump 'fascist to the core' and 'the most dangerous person to this country'
Post came after Milley's retirement speech calling Trump a 'wannabe dictator'
